title: Senior Vice President of Engineering
shortDescription:
- Define engineering vision/strategy aligned to product roadmaps for Zeenea’s data intelligence platform.
- Oversee AI, connectivity, and cloud operations while driving delivery excellence and reliability.
- Scale a global engineering org with modern practices (CI/CD, DevOps, observability, automation).
fitRationale:
- Strong data-platform leadership role with explicit AI + cloud operations scope.
- Emphasis on scalable, trusted data intelligence aligns with your governance-first platform narrative.
- Executive cross-functional partnership mirrors your enterprise architecture and delivery leadership.

title: Director - Data Engineering and Platforms
shortDescription:
- Lead multi-team data platform engineering for massive-scale streaming and AI/ML workloads.
- Own reliability, observability, SLAs, and cost efficiency for real-time data systems.
- Partner with Product/AI/Analytics to translate business goals into platform outcomes.
fitRationale:
- Enterprise-scale data platform leadership with explicit governance and reliability mandates.
- Clear AI/ML enablement scope fits your data-products-to-context narrative.
- Cross-functional, high-scale execution mirrors your current platform operating model.

title: Chief Architect
shortDescription:
- Lead enterprise architecture and set the long-term technology vision for payments platforms.
- Define the integrated payments platform blueprint and modernization roadmap.
- Manage and mentor a team of architects; enforce standards and architectural governance.
fitRationale:
- Strong enterprise architecture scope with governance and platform modernization.
- Payments domain adds regulated, compliance-heavy complexity that matches trust-at-scale themes.
- Executive influence across product/engineering aligns with your chief architect profile.

title: Chief Architect
shortDescription:
- Establish enterprise architecture standards and governance for CIS’s systems portfolio.
- Define “as-is” and “to-be” architectures and guide modernization strategy.
- Advise leadership on architectural tradeoffs, cloud evolution, and system consolidation.
fitRationale:
- Security-first organization with strong governance and standards focus.
- Enterprise architecture leadership aligns to your platform + policy-aware AI positioning.
- Cross-program modernization scope mirrors your large-scale transformation experience.

title: Vice President of Engineering
shortDescription:
- Set technical vision and architecture for a health benefits platform with third-party integrations.
- Scale the engineering org and build delivery/quality/incident-response processes.
- Partner with product and exec leadership to drive platform outcomes and KPIs.
fitRationale:
- Regulated healthcare domain aligns with governance, trust, and compliance themes.
- Platform/integration focus maps to your enterprise data + ecosystem narrative.
- Executive role with architecture + org scaling responsibilities.

title: Director, Engineering - Databricks Mosaic AI
shortDescription:
- Lead teams building Mosaic AI products at the NYC AI Engineering Hub.
- Partner with product and research to launch and scale ML/GenAI capabilities for enterprise customers.
- Define the future of AI and data applications on the Databricks platform.
fitRationale:
- High-signal AI platform leadership role with enterprise adoption impact.
- Strong fit for your narrative on governed, scalable AI delivery across data platforms.
- Cross-functional product + research alignment mirrors your context-graph and platform strategy work.

title: Senior Director - Cloud Platform Engineering
shortDescription:
- Own cloud platform strategy across security, availability, performance, and cost governance.
- Lead platform engineering + observability teams; drive AI/automation for reliability and efficiency.
- Build scalable, secure cloud foundations (AWS/Azure/GCP, Kubernetes) with strong compliance posture.
fitRationale:
- Strong match to your governed platform + security-first AI narrative.
- Emphasis on cloud governance, observability, and automation aligns with enterprise trust-at-scale themes.
- Identity/security domain reinforces compliance and policy-aware execution.

title: Sr. Director, Data Platform Engineering & Operations
shortDescription:
- Lead SIE’s data + AI platform ecosystem (streaming/ingestion/warehouse, governance/observability).
- Operate at massive scale (millions of users; billions of data points/day).
- Stack mentions: Kafka, Databricks, Snowflake; governance tools (Alation/Collibra).
- Bay Area role (San Mateo).
fitRationale:
- Enterprise-scale data/platform leadership with explicit governance + observability responsibilities.
- Strong bridge to AI platform strategy (Databricks/Snowflake + AI/ML adoption).
- Big-org cross-functional leadership very close to your current operating environment.

title: Senior Vice President of Data & Infrastructure
shortDescription:
- Report to CTO; oversee 80–100 engineers across data infrastructure (ingestion, prediction, measurement, exchanges).
- Own build/buy/partner strategy for data + infra; drive impact across ambiguous problem spaces.
- Lead a US-based remote engineering org with strong cross-functional collaboration.
- Healthcare context implies high governance/privacy requirements.
fitRationale:
- Very aligned to enterprise data platform leadership + AI/analytics enablement at org scale.
- Strong ‘data as product’ leadership role with room to shape governance, standards, and execution rigor.
- Regulated domain (healthcare) matches your governance/compliance focus.

title: Director of Engineering, Data Platform
shortDescription:
- Own multi-year data platform strategy with AI-ready governance, lineage, and trusted metrics.
- Run platform reliability (SLAs, observability, incident response) and data quality standards.
- Lead and scale data platform teams supporting analytics, data science, and AI-enabled products.
fitRationale:
- Strong match to your context + governance themes (lineage, quality, policy-aware AI).
- Healthcare context reinforces trust, compliance, and auditability narratives.
- Executive-level platform leadership with measurable enterprise outcomes.
